summary: Growing up gay in the South, a high school girl seeks the help of a therapist to come out to her family and friends in this coming-of-age, coming-of-gay story.
cast: Joel Coady|William Joel Coady|Bella Coletta|Brittany Halls|Leigh Higginbotham|Eli Jolley|Quinn Marcus|Stacy Melich|Mike Schatz|Dani Sherrick|Ben Silver|Bennett Welch
title: Alone with People
